channel.title: Comments on: Speculative-Inspired Arts: Erika Carlevarino
channel.description: Stellar Short Fiction by Women-Identified Writers Since 2010

item.title: By: Speculative-Inspired Arts: A Look Back and Ahead – Luna Station Quarterly
item.dc:creator: Speculative-Inspired Arts: A Look Back and Ahead – Luna Station Quarterly
item.description: […] Erika Carlevarino: “During the pandemic, I have been contacted to create characters for a film in stop motion in Peru. I’m still working on the creation of characters, it’s a first phase and it’s not final, but I’m very excited to participate in such a project. Meanwhile, I continue with my fantastic creatures and colored lamps.” Erika is constantly adding new dolls to her Etsy shop, The Elven Refuge. See more of Erika’s work at her website and her Etsy shop, and follow her on Facebook and Instagram. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Erika Carlevarino: “During the pandemic, I have been contacted to create characters for a film in stop motion in Peru. I’m still working on the creation of characters, it’s a first phase and it’s not final, but I’m very excited to participate in such a project. Meanwhile, I continue with my fantastic creatures and colored lamps.” Erika is constantly adding new dolls to her Etsy shop, The Elven Refuge. See more of Erika’s work at her website and her Etsy shop, and follow her on Facebook and Instagram. […]
